# init(itemProvider:)

**Initializer**

Creates and initializes a collaboration view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(itemProvider: NSItemProvider)
```

## Parameters

- **itemProvider**: A unique identifier for a collaboration.
title: init(itemProvider:)
